Text: Rated R for strong brutal violence throughout, grisly images, some graphic sexual content, nudity and pervasive language.

lol, yeah, alot of nudity and ALOT of fthis and fthat!
but excellent movie!
the "accountant" is awesome!
Audio goes outta sync for last third of the movie but still watchable. A/V 6 maybe 7 depending on what you view it on.
